1.6.0.commit_description: Update against upstream LC0 v0.28 to workaround build issues on newer Linux distributions.

1.5.1.commit_description: Limit max CPU threads to 64 to workaround upstream issue with lc0 bailing out otherwise.

1.5.0.commit_description: Update against latest upstream along with updated network, add eigen as possible external dependency.

1.4.0.commit_description: Update against lc0 0.25, use new network as old one was removed.

1.3.0.commit_description: Update against latest lc0 v0.23.2 upstream, other test improvements.

1.1.1.commit_description: Add zlib to external dependency list.

1.1.0.commit_description: Set threads option always for CPU testing.

1.0.1.commit_description: Allow CUDA and BLAS benchmarking back-end support.

1.0.0.commit_description: Initial commit of lc0 / lczero chess benchmark using neural networks with GPU compute.
